comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:6.0.2) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0.2
Build ID: 20110902133214

Steps to reproduce:

Download iso (2Gb). On downloading, minimize FF, log off OS. (WIn XP Sp3).
Error msg from FF on logoff, broken DL after log in. File download broken. (In Ctrl-J
dialog error message).
comments.author: aaa5500@ya.ru
